description: Try our easy to follow Pineapple & Passionfruit Tropical Refresher recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pineapple & Passionfruit Tropical Refresher Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bruise lime leaves and lemongrass with your hands to release their aroma. Combine with pineapple juice, ginger and sugar in a medium saucepan over medium-high heat. Bring to the boil, then remove from heat and set aside for 15 minutes to cool and allow flavours to develop. Strain and refrigerate until chilled and ready to serve.
Scoop pulp from passionfruit into a bowl and whisk with a fork to separate seeds. Stir into juice mixture.
Fill 4 glasses with ice, pour over juice and top up with mineral water.
